author: pandapip1
content: There's been a lot of talk about changing the behavior of SELFDESTRUCT, but I have one question. As I see it, either the opcode should be fully removed, or the opcode's behavior should be changed without making any backward incompatible changes. Wouldn't proposals like https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6046 simply be the worst of both worlds?
